vendor_name: Pullman Bunker Bay Resort, Margaret River Region
title: Margaret River Region: Romantic Food & Wine Escape
description: Experience the gourmet food and wine, coastal scenery and beachfront views (perfect for whale watching!) of Western Australia’s famous Margaret River Region staying at Pullman Bunker Bay Resort. Includes daily buffet breakfast, a bottle of local wine on arrival and a guaranteed late checkout.

vendor_name: Pullman Bunker Bay Resort, Margaret River Region
title: Romantic Beachside Retreat in the Stunning Margaret River Region
description: Experience the gourmet food and wine, coastal scenery and beachfront views of Western Australia’s famous Margaret River Region staying at Pullman Bunker Bay Resort. Relax on the beach, explore stunning limestone cliffs, visit wineries or even try whale spotting during your escape to this amazing part of Australia. Includes daily buffet breakfast, a welcome drink on arrival, a bottle of Margaret River Region wine and a guaranteed 1pm late checkout.

title: Countryside Getaway with Indulgent Gourmet Inclusions
description: Lovers of fine wine and gastronomy will fall head over heels for Cape Lodge, a gorgeous countryside getaway in the midst of Margaret River wine country. Includes daily à la carte and continental buffet breakfast, a spectacular four-course chef's tasting menu for two, a bottle of local wine on arrival, a complimentary aperitif hour with free-flow Cape Lodge wines every evening and more.
